name: Carver Lee, MSc
description: A geologist, sailor, teacher, and designer all rolled into one, Carver believes that learning and creating are always the way forward.

name: Elaine Perignat, PhD
description: A spirited over-thinker with genuine enthusiasm for teaching and learning. Elaine loves to paint, create, build, and play if it means getting her hands dirty. Literally.

name: Leigha Robinson
description: A Software Developer with a love of music, gardening, and using technology to make the world a better place. Leigha deeply believes in TEAM: Together Everyone Achieves More!

name: Kenzie Bottoms
description: A problem solver who codes, makes art, and roller skates, Kenzie is trying to pay it forward and delighted to work with such kind, talented people in the process.

name: Patrick Cheng
description: An earnest problem solver that loves to break things down and build things up. Loves food, beer, and communing with the great outdoors.

name: Stephanie Rapciak, M.A.
description: Veteran teacher with 13 years of experience teaching middle and high school science in public and private schools. She is passionate about designing student-centered curriculum that empowers kids to take on the world!
